text:
@realDonaldTrump @narendramodi W.H.O. declared an emergency on JANUARY 30th and you put together a coronavirus response team, dubbed Operation Warp Speed, today MAY 15th?
What have you been doing all of this time: TWEETING?

#Trump #Trump2020 #COVID19 #TrumpVirus #COVID #COVIDIOTS 

https://t.co/LQOcEEVwDE
